Sets the core table to the prescription table private

Charts.getDiagnosis ( $  enr  ) 

Gets the diagnosis text based on the encounter_nr key. The result is sorted ascending by date and time. public

Parameters:
int Encounter number
Returns:
mixed adodb record object or boolean
